category: news
title: "Nation's robotics industry makes big strides"
excerpt: "China's robotics industry has made great strides, with its revenue surpassing 170 billion yuan ($23.3 billion) last year, maintaining double-digit growth, Xin said, adding that the nation's sales of industrial robots accounted for more than half of the world's total in 2022, ranking first across the globe for 10 consecutive years."
